Name: Dice Big
Description: what|https://i.imgur.com/P3zIMxe.png
Script: When inflicted: var s = new elements.Skill(~Dice Fubny~); var tw = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null[;]1[;]null); tw._repeat = -1; tw.onRepeat(s.execute[;][self[;]target]); tw.move(); s.remove();

Name: jackpotrangeup
Description: Increase jackpot range by <value> at the start of your turn.

Name: rippermode
Description: Do [sword]<value> extra damage with each attack this turn.

Name: rippermodefail
Description: Do [sword]<value> extra damage with each attack next turn.

Name: manualroll
Description: Autoroll automatically <value> time(s).
Script: When inflicted: var s = new elements.Skill(~Against All Odds_old~); var act = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null[;] 0.001[;] null); act.onComplete(s.execute[;] [self[;] target]); s.script = ~ if(!self.roll_error && !self.roll_jackpot){ removestatusself(\~manualroll\~[;] 1); robotroll(true); self.getskillcard().animate(\~flashandshake\~); } else{ sfx(\~jackpot_autoroll\~); } ~; act.move();
Script: Before Start Turn: var s = new elements.Skill(~Against All Odds_old~); var act = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null[;] 0.1[;] null); act.onComplete(s.execute[;] [self[;] target]); s.script = ~robotroll(true); self.getskillcard().animate(\~flashandshake\~); removestatusself(\~manualroll\~[;] 1); ~; act.move();

Name: survivenomorehehe
Description: Big Boner Down The Lane (this erro rmesage)[;][;]    if you're readin' this... talk ta polly...S

Name: cursenext
Description: You've cursed yourself for the next turn...

Name: storedprize
Description: [95%]Next Jackpot skill gets used <value> extra time(s).
Script: When inflicted: var act = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null[;] 0.1[;] null); var s = new elements.DiceyScript(~if(self.roll_jackpot > 0 && self.getskillcard().skills.length >= 3){   for(i in 0...self.getskillcard().skills.length){     var s = self.getskillcard().skills[i];     if(s.script.indexOf(\~storedprizeinjected\~) == -1 && s.script.indexOf(\~storedprizeimmune\~) == -1){       s.script += \~ /*storedprizeinjected*/ if(self.hasstatus(\\\~storedprize\\\~)){var st = self.getstatus(\\\~storedprize\\\~);var newskill = new elements.Skill(\\\~\~+s.name+\~\\\~);var act = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null[;] 0.15+st.value*0.15[;] null);act.onRepeat(newskill.execute[;][self[;]target]);act._repeat = st.value;act.move();self.removestatus(\\\~storedprize\\\~);}\~;     }   } }~); act.onRepeat(s.execute[;] [self[;] target]); act._repeat = -1; s.set(~act~[;] act); s.set(~self~[;] self); act.move();

Name: storedbonus
Description: Bonus Payout will trigger <value> time(s) next turn.
Script: On Start Turn: self.roll_jackpotbonus += getstatusself(~storedbonus~); self.roll_range += getstatusself(~storedbonus~); adjustrobotcounter(0); removestatusself(~storedbonus~[;] ALL);

Name: storedbonusupgraded
Description: Bonus Payout+ will trigger <value> time(s) next turn.
Script: On Start Turn: self.roll_jackpotbonus += getstatusself(~storedbonus~); self.roll_range += getstatusself(~storedbonus~) * 2; adjustrobotcounter(0); removestatusself(~storedbonus~[;] ALL);

Name: survivenextturn
Description: Gain 1 survive next turn.

Name: placeholder
Description: (This should always be replaced! If you're reading this[;] it's a bug!)
Script: When inflicted: var sD = switch target.innate[0]{ case ~weakfire~: ~You take double damage from [fire] fire damage and [fire] Burn.~; case ~weakice~: ~You take double damage from [ice] ice damage.~; case ~weakshock~: ~You take double damage from [shock] shock damage and [shock] Shocked?.~; case ~strongfire~: ~You take half damage from [fire] fire damage and [fire] Burn.~; case ~strongpoison~: ~You take half damage from [poison] poison.~; case ~immunestatus~: ~You can't be inflicted with [lock] locked and [ice] freeze.~; case ~goesfirst~: ~You go first during the start of this battle. So[;] really[;] nothing changes.~; case ~gaindice~: ~You gain an extra dice at the start of each turn.~; case ~vampire~: ~You can't be defeated without a Wooden Stake... which Drake doesn't have.~; default: ~You gain the effects of your enemy's stolen innate.~; } status.template.description = sD; var statuses = [~fire~[;] ~ice~[;] ~shock~[;] ~poison~[;] ~lock~[;] ~dice~]; for(i in 0...statuses.length){ if(sD.indexOf(statuses[i]) != -1){ status.symbol = statuses[i]; } } if(target.innate[0] == ~goesfirst~) status.symbol = ~dodge~;

Name: jackpotshard
Description: 4 Jackpot Shards combine into an automatic Autoroll.

Name: iceallnextturn
Description: Freeze all your dice next turn.

Name: icenextturn
Description: Gain <value> freeze next turn.

Name: extrajackpotskill
Description: Your jackpot has <value> extra options. Shouldn't show up! If it does[;] it's buggin... and that ain't thuggin...

Name: virus
Description: Take <value> damage at the end of your turn if you triggered an error during it.
Script: End Turn: if(self.roll_error){ attackself(getstatusself(~virus~)); sfxdamage(getstatusself(~virus~)); } /*A leftover thingy from when I wanted to add custom enemies to the game. This one ain't that great. Turns Slime into an unloseable fight.*/

Description: You know the gist. It's invisible[;] BITCH!!!! What're you poking around for[;] damn!!!!
Script: When inflicted: /*ok im sorry for swearing in the description that was very mean of me i won't do it again i prommy [heart]*/

Name: bigberthavisual
Description: Every jackpot skill has a 33% chance to be upgraded when rolled.

Name: bsodvisual
Description: When you trigger an error[;] you can still use your jackpot skills.

Name: bluedevilcredits
Description: The Blue Devil is a skill made by Jultima!

Name: retriggerall
Description: Whenever you re-use an equipment[;] re-trigger it instead with the same dice.

Name: retriggernext
Description: Whenever you re-use an equipment[;] re-trigger it instead with the same dice. Unimplemented.

Name: doublespookyfury
Description: 50% chance to use the next equipment twice[;]|lasts until something triggers it.

Name: reequippolly
Description: Inflict this with [recycle] on x equips[;] like Pirate Hook.
Script: When inflicted: if((self.hasstatus(~curse~) && chance(Rules.curseodds))){ for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.slots.length > 0){ eq.addtag(~curseattract~); eq.removetag(~curseavoid~); } } } else{ if(self.hasstatus(~retriggerall~) # self.hasstatus(~maroonall~)){ sfx(~_recycle~[;] 1); sfx(~_fury~[;] 1); inflictself(~doublespookyfury~); } else{ inflictself(~reequipnext~); sfx(~_recycle~[;]~~[;]0.2); } removestatusself(~reequippolly~[;] ALL); for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.slots.length > 0){ eq.addtag(~curseavoid~); eq.removetag(~curseattract~); } if(eq.hastag(~triggersonreuse~)){ eq.doequipmentaction(self[;] target[;] 1[;] [][;] 0.2[;] false[;] false[;] false); } } self.setvar(~turnreusecount~[;] self.getvar(~turnreusecount~) + 1); self.setvar(~doublereusecount~[;] self.getvar(~turnreusecount~) * 2); }

Name: reequippolly@nouse
Description: Inflict this when gaining re-uses from an equipment that |doesn't immediately use them. e.g. Hookshot. Unimplemented.
Script: When inflicted: if(self.hasstatus(~retriggerall~)){ inflictself(~retriggernext~); sfx(~_fury~); } else{ inflictself(~reequipnext~); sfx(~_recycle~[;]~~[;]0.2); } removestatusself(~reequippolly@nouse~[;] ALL);

Name: retriggerpolly
Description: Inflict this with [retrigger] on x equips[;] like the second half of Which Way[;] Captain?.
Script: When inflicted: if((self.hasstatus(~curse~) && chance(Rules.curseodds))){ for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.slots.length > 0){ eq.addtag(~curseattract~); eq.removetag(~curseavoid~); } } } else{ if(self.hasstatus(~retriggerall~) # self.hasstatus(~maroonall~)){ inflictself(~reequipnext~); sfx(~_recycle~[;]~~[;]0.2); } else{ sfx(~_recycle~[;] 1); sfx(~_fury~[;] 1); inflictself(~doublespookyfury~); } removestatusself(~reequippolly~[;] ALL); for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.slots.length > 0){ eq.addtag(~curseavoid~); eq.removetag(~curseattract~); } if(eq.hastag(~triggersonreuse~)){ eq.doequipmentaction(self[;] target[;] 1[;] [][;] 0.2[;] false[;] false[;] false); } } self.setvar(~turnreusecount~[;] self.getvar(~turnreusecount~) + 1); self.setvar(~doublereusecount~[;] self.getvar(~turnreusecount~) * 2); }

Name: maroonedchad
Description: (Shouldn't appear. Ensures every equip retriggers on all values.)

Name: maroonall
Description: Whenever you use an equipment[;] re-trigger it instead with the same dice.

Name: recycleon1
Description: All of your equipment [recycle] on 1.
Script: When inflicted: for(eq in self.equipment){ var arr = eq.getvar(~redice~); if(arr.length > 0){ if(arr.indexOf(1) == -1){ arr.push(1); eq.setvar(~redice~[;] arr); } } else { eq.setvar(~redice~[;] [1]); } }
Script: On any status infliction: for(eq in self.equipment){ var arr = eq.getvar(~redice~); if(arr.length > 0){ if(arr.indexOf(1) == -1){ arr.push(1); eq.setvar(~redice~[;] arr); } } else { eq.setvar(~redice~[;] [1]); } }
Script: On any equipment use: for(eq in self.equipment){ var arr = eq.getvar(~redice~); if(arr.length > 0){ if(arr.indexOf(1) == -1){ arr.push(1); eq.setvar(~redice~[;] arr); } } else { eq.setvar(~redice~[;] [1]); } }
Script: On any countdown reduce: for(eq in self.equipment){ var arr = eq.getvar(~redice~); if(arr.length > 0){ if(arr.indexOf(1) == -1){ arr.push(1); eq.setvar(~redice~[;] arr); } } else { eq.setvar(~redice~[;] [1]); } }
